comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Buck_Weaver Buck was one of the 'Eight Men Out', and according to the wikipedia article, in the movie of the same name, John Cusack played Buck. It has been argued that it should have been 'Seven Men Out' as Buck argued he was not in on the fix. He was never reinstated as the argument was that he could have known, should have known and should have told officials.
